channel.title: How do you make dragon claws only get 2 spec?
channel.description: i got dragon claws in my server its like dds spec 4 spec i want it have 2.

item.title: How do you make dragon claws only get 2 spec?
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Ok your special attack should look something similar at this just change the “24” to “49” and the “25” to “50”

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ setAnimation(6000); dclaws = 3; checkclaws(); specialAmount -= 25; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; usingSpecial = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make dragon claws only get 2 spec?
